MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK9 postcode area of Stirling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.26pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required to an underground cable on Causewayhead road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:01PM on Sunday 24 January 2021.
